table.name: its4you_labels
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `its4you_labels` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tabid` int(19) NOT NULL, `fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `lang` char(5) NOT NULL, `translate_label` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `is_in_global` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `tabid` (`tabid`), KEY `fieldid` (`fieldid`), KEY `lang` (`lang`), KEY `is_in_global` (`is_in_global`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
